title: Shiva Charan - Founder's Playbook
description: Insights and learnings from a 21-year-old entrepreneur building AI companions, dating apps, and EV rental platforms

items.title: Building AI Companions: Lessons from lyzn.ai
items.summary: Insights into building personal AI superintelligence and creating an AI companion that thinks, plans, and acts for users.
items.content_text: Deep dive into the challenges and opportunities of building AI companions, lessons learned from developing lyzn.ai, and the future of personal AI superintelligence.

items.title: Product Strategy in Dating Apps: The Juzzt Journey
items.summary: Building a dating app with rating-based compatibility and defining product roadmap in a competitive market.
items.content_text: Exploring the unique challenges of dating app development, implementing rating-based compatibility systems, and strategic product decisions in the competitive dating app market.

items.title: EV Tech Revolution: Building Mjollnir Bike Rental
items.summary: Creating an electric vehicle rental application and navigating the EV technology landscape.
items.content_text: Insights into building EV rental platforms, understanding the electric vehicle market, and the technical challenges of creating bike sharing applications.

items.title: From Tutorial Hell to Shark Tank: The Avidia Story
items.summary: Co-founding an AI learning platform to combat tutorial hell and the journey to Shark Tank India auditions.
items.content_text: The complete journey of building Avidia, from identifying the tutorial hell problem to developing an AI learning platform and pitching at Shark Tank India auditions.

items.title: Building MVPs for Founders: Coffeecodes Insights
items.summary: Lessons from founding a tech consultancy and serving 12+ clients, bridging ideas to market-ready products.
items.content_text: Key learnings from running a tech consultancy, helping founders build MVPs, and the process of turning ideas into market-ready products.

items.title: Jagriti Yatra: Lessons from 500+ Founders
items.summary: Insights from a 15-day entrepreneurial journey across India, connecting with grassroots innovators and fellow founders.
items.content_text: Reflections on the transformative Jagriti Yatra experience, learnings from fellow founders, and insights from grassroots innovation across India.
